title: Story of outspoken women's rights advocate captured in 'Seeing Allred'
text:
Story of outspoken women's rights advocate captured in 'Seeing Allred'   01:50 
''Seeing Allred'' is a documentary focusing on the life and career of the women's rights lawyer Gloria Allred. It's coming out at a time where her views which were seen as outspoken in the past have now
